entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6.
